feedback_description:
Let us know what features
you'd like to see!
We'll do our best to add them!
appDescription:
This is an app where we can freely create whatever we want.
You can choose from various features like pixel art drawing, counter, (roulette, QR code generator, pedometer, ladder game) and more from the home screen!
In the future, we may add more features based on your suggestions, so feel free to share your ideas with us anytime!
As for why the banana? Well, just because!
not_ready:
This feature is not ready yet.
Please wait for the next update!
